definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: It’s all about what kind of partnership you can form with them.
sentences.chinese: 收费与否取决于你与推特建立的是哪种伙伴关系。

sentences.english: The colors and groupings provide a way to look another level down for tweets that use a term such as "October.
sentences.chinese: 色差与组别提供了另一种划分推特信息的方法。

sentences.english: Because it hasn't really brought change in Iran post the election.
sentences.chinese: 在伊朗的选举后推特并没有带来改变。

sentences.english: Some of China’s more aggressive journalists are also keen users.
sentences.chinese: 中国一些最为激进的记者也是推特的死忠粉丝。

sentences.english: But with that one swipe, I learn of the merchant's Twitter handle.
sentences.chinese: 但就是那么一刷，让我了解到商人的推特账号。

sentences.english: In 2008 I stepped into the chairman role of Twitter.
Twitterappears to be a good avenue, as well.
sentences.chinese: 推特似乎也是一个很好的途径。
我们就是这么推广推特的。

sentences.english: So, the story became very, very easy to tell.
sentences.chinese: 所以推广推特变得特别容易。

sentences.english: I never know what the next tweet is going to be.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不知到下条推特消息是什么。

sentences.english: And you Twittered, Tweeted these pictures around the world.
sentences.chinese: 你把那些照片用推特发给了全世界。

sentences.english: But now it is catching on elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 但现在，推特开始风行于别处。

sentences.english: For the first two years of Twitter's life, we were flying blind.
sentences.chinese: 推特诞生的头两年，我们经营的很盲目。

sentences.english: Could be they were Tweeting and Friending.

definition: to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
